description:
Attention all Delena fans: we promised you that "The Vampire Diaries" Season 5 premiere was filled with sexy Damon/Elena goodness, and now we've got proof for you.DE粉儿们注意啦：我们承诺过的《吸血鬼日记》第五季首映将充满达蒙和埃琳娜的激情场景现在兑现啦~请看预告。
The CW just released a sneak peek clip from next week's premiere on Facebook, and though the 50 seconds of Elena in the bubble bath with Damon saying the sweetest things to comfort her is amazing in and of itself, this is only the tip of the Delena iceberg in the premiere. CW目前放出了长达50秒的第一集预告，埃琳娜在泡沫浴，达蒙在一旁说些甜言蜜语安慰她的话，而这只是DE甜蜜场景的冰山一角。
The scene takes place in the beginning of the episode, before Elena heads off to Whitmore College with Caroline. 这场景发生在第一集的最开始，在埃琳娜即将和卡罗琳动身前往惠特莫尔大学之前。

title: 吸血鬼日记S05E01预告：DE浴室激情
